We updated our baggage policy starting January 23,2020.

What is included in each fare?

Vuela Basic
1 personal ítem
(Must fit under the seat in front of you)

Vuela Classic
1 personal ítem
1 carry on
1 checked bag
Priority boarding

Vuela Plus
1 personal ítem
2 carry on
1 checked bag
Priority boarding
Free standard seat selection
Personal attention


For more visit www.volaris.com

- With the latest version of our app, you "Fly Sure". We are ready to take you to your favorite destinations at low cost and with new biosecurity measures. Get ready to live the best travel experience.

- With the latest version of our app, you "Fly Sure". We are ready to take you to your favorite destinations at low cost and with new biosecurity measures. Get ready to live the best travel experience.

- We want you to feel safe when traveling with us. So in this new version, you will find:
- New combos to match your needs for flexibility and safety during your trip
- Quick access to our Chatbot in WhatsApp to answer your main questions immediately.
- General bug fixing to improve booking and check-in experience

As of October 30, our new baggage policy comes into force, so those passengers who purchase tickets from this date will have the benefits of this new policy applied according to the modality acquired

What is included in each fare?

Vuela Basic
1 personal ítem
(Must fit under the seat in front of you)

Vuela Classic
1 personal ítem
1 carry on

Vuela Plus
1 personal ítem
2 carry on
1 checked bag
Boarding zone 1

We made some improvements to our app so you can travel your way at a low-cost. With this version, you can easily book your next trip to enjoy a vacation, reunite with your loved ones, close that deal you’ve been waiting for, or discover new places. You may also customize your trips and purchase add-ons if you need so. Download it now and get ready for takeoff!
